caption: Network
description: Network event is a generic event that defines a set of attributes available in the Network category. As a generic event, it could be used to log events that are not otherwise defined by the Network category. Note: this event class should not be used a final solution. This generic event class should only be used temporarily until time can be spent mapping to a specific event class.
name: network

dst_endpoint.description: The responder (server) in a network connection.

src_endpoint.description: The initiator (client) of the network connection.
